Title: Only 14 lakh individuals fell in 30% tax bracket in 2012-13
Content: Only 14 lakh individuals out of the 2.89 crore assessees in the country declared an annual income of over Rs. 10 lakh, attracting the highest tax bracket of 30 per cent, in assessment year 2012-13. A
Author: PTI
Description: Only 14 lakh individuals out of the 2.89 crore assessees in the country declared an annual income of over Rs. 10 lakh, attracting the highest tax bracket of 30 per cent, in assessment year 2012-13. A
